languages.text: Have additional {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. This effect is lost on taking damage to non-temporal {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Have additional {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. This effect is lost on taking damage to non-temporal {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: У персонажа увеличено {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}. При получении урона с потерей {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, которое не является временным, эффект снимается.
languages.original_text: This character has their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} increased. Upon taking damage and losing non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the effect is lost.

traits.locale_text: У персонажа увеличено {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}. При получении урона с потерей {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, которое не является временным, эффект снимается.
У персонажа увеличено {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g}. При получении урона с потерей {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, которое не является временным, эффект снимается.

languages.text: This character has their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} increased. Upon taking damage and losing non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the effect is lost.

languages.text: Este personaje tiene un aumento de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}. Al sufrir daño y perder {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} no temporales, el efecto se pierde.
languages.original_text: This character has their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} increased. Upon taking damage and losing non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the effect is lost.

traits.locale_text: Este personaje tiene un aumento de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}. Al sufrir daño y perder {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} no temporales, el efecto se pierde.

languages.text: このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}が上昇している。ダメージを受けた際に、一時的なものではない{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を失った時点でこの効果は失われる。
languages.original_text: This character has their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} increased. Upon taking damage and losing non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the effect is lost.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g} が上昇している。ダメージを受け、一時体力ではない {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を負った時にこの効果は失われる。

languages.text: 此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}增加。当此角色受到伤害，损失非临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，此效果消失。
languages.original_text: This character has their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} increased. Upon taking damage and losing non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the effect is lost.

traits.locale_text: 此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}增加。当此角色受到伤害，损失非临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，此效果消失。

languages.text: Ce personnage voit sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} augmenter. L'effet est annulé s'il subit des dégâts ou perd toute {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessure{/g} non temporaire.
languages.original_text: This character has their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} increased. Upon taking damage and losing non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the effect is lost.

traits.locale_text: Ce personnage voit sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} augmentée. L'effet est annulé s'il subit des dégâts ou perd toute {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessure{/g} non temporaire.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} dieses Charakters erhöht sich. Wenn er Schaden erleidet und nicht-temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, endet der Effekt.
languages.original_text: This character has their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} increased. Upon taking damage and losing non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the effect is lost.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} dieses Charakters erhöht sich. Wenn er Schaden erleidet und nicht-temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, endet der Effekt.

languages.text: Bu karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri artar. Hasar alıp da geçici olmayan {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını kaybettiğinde etki de ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: This character has their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} increased. Upon taking damage and losing non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the effect is lost.
